tasks.label: clangbuild
tasks.detail: C++ Build Pretask designed for use with Apple Clang. Uses C++ standard 20 by default. Passes to the compiler a single source file. Useful for projects with multiple tasks/problems where each problem is in it's own isolated file.

tasks.label: clangbuild
tasks.detail: C++ Build Pretask designed for use with Apple Clang. Uses C++ standard 20 by default. Useful for large projects where a single task/sub-project may be split up into many files. If this is the case and there are many 'sub-projects' then put each project into a single parent folder.

tasks.label: gccbuild
tasks.detail: C++ Build Pretask. Optimized for use with Debian Bullseye GCC. Uses C++ standard 20 by default. Passes to the compiler a single source file. Useful for projects with multiple tasks/problems where each problem is in it's own isolated file.

tasks.label: gccbuild
tasks.detail: C++ Build Pretask. Optimized for use with Debian Bullseye GCC. Uses C++ standard 20 by default. Useful for large projects where a single task/sub-project may be split up into many files. If this is the case and there are many 'sub-projects' then put each project into a single parent folder.
